Name: Colgan, Mr. E. Joseph
Profession: trimmers were apparently more likely rescued in boat 13 due to its location. replace firemen to lifeboat 15 if there is not enough space left, as they were more likely to get safed by that boat. Lifeboat 13 also launched from the starboard side, slightly ahead of 15, and was closer to the midship gangways, where trimmers might have exited. Records indicate trimmers were present in Lifeboat 13, but fewer compared to firemen/stokers in 15.
